name: Lucid Fate: Poems Between Worlds
description:
Lucid Fate is a WIP game about a creature coming to terms with the fact that it does not have free will.

Poems Between Worlds is a book of poetry used in this game to convey the barrier between conscious and subconscious ideas.
Both are completely foreign to a creature that cannot think but merely act.

This is the concept for Lucid, and hopefully will be made a reality in the near future.
